General.Name: Shanghai Dragonnet Tech
General.Description: Shanghai DragonNet Technology Co.,Ltd. provides IT services and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers IT maintenance services; IT outsourcing services; IT professional services; and preventive inspection, technical support, fault resolution, component replacement, and other support services. It also provides range of products, such as PhegData data storage cloud platform, Phydata all-flash array, Phegda server, Phegda SSD, big data marketing service, big data application platform construction, zhuozhilian solution, PBData database machine, remanufacturing equipment, Pridata Private Cloud Platform, PCloud-DCOS, PCloud-open stack, cloud data center construction consulting, and next generation flexible data center services. Shanghai DragonNet Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
